preface.title: Foreword
preface.para: ELinks is lacking proper documentation. For a long time the old Links manual has been the only real documentation available besides the man pages. This is an attempt at providing an ELinks user reference manual. It is a work in progress. Donations or comments are very welcome. See how to contribute in section "How to contribute" below.
Much of this manual derives from the Links manual written by Cliff Cunnington, <cliff@ccnet.demon.nl>. Thanks to Cliff for the work he has made available.
This is version &version; of the manual. It is a work in progress. Contributions are very welcome. Please consider to contribute if you see something missing. See how to contribute below.
The ELinks manual is available in the following formats:

varlistentry.term: HTML as a gzip'ed tar file:
as well as a gzip'ed PostScript file:

preface.para: There can exist different versions of the manual. But the the newest version will always be available at the manuals page at the ELinks homepage.
This manual is written by ELinks users that wants to help other users. If you want to help us make the best ELinks manual possible your contribution will be very welcome.

All help is useful; from people providing chapters of various features to people fixing bad grammer or typos. If you have suggestions to improve a chapter or some text snippet in the book we would be happy to hear from you. We are open for all suggestions and constructive reviews.
Further info about how to contribute can be found on the manuals homepage: http://elinks.or.cz/documentation/manual.
